description:
At Goldblatt + Singer in St. Louis, Missouri, the attorneys in our law firm focus on personal injury. Why? Because we are dedicated to helping injured people and that is exactly what we have been doing since 1949. We care about each and every client and have represented over 25,000 of them in the St. Louis metropolitan area and throughout Missouri, Illinois and the Midwest.

Our attorneys have recovered over $400 million on behalf of our clients, earning Goldblatt + Singer a reputation as the leading personal injury law firm in the Midwest. We stand ready to put our experience to work for people injured by the negligence or misconduct of others in the following areas:

  • Motor vehicle accidents: car, truck, motorcycle
  • Premises liability: slips, trips, falls
  • Defective products: design defects, manufacturing defects, failure to warn
  • Workplace injuries: workers' compensation, railroad injuries, construction injuries, toxic exposure, mesothelioma, asbestosis
  • Medical malpractice: misdiagnosis, emergency room errors, surgical errors, birth injuries, medication errors, dangerous drugs

We also represent grieving families in their wrongful death lawsuits after the loss of their loved one.

Partnering With Clients

Beginning with their free initial consultations, our clients know they can count on our law firm to be their partner, guiding them through every step of the complicated aftermath of their serious injuries. One of our attorneys is always available to answer their questions, discuss their options and keep them fully advised of the progress of their case.

Our attorneys have remained true to the same Goldblatt + Singer values for over 60 years: understanding, compassion, hard work, determination, focus and aggressive client representation.
